sentences.en: A hot bath should help to relax you.
sentences.cn: 洗个热水澡可以帮助你放松下来。

sentences.en: Close your eyes. Relax. Let your body loosen up.
sentences.cn: 闭上眼睛。放松。让身体尽量松弛。

sentences.en: Gentle exercise can relax stiff shoulder muscles.
sentences.cn: 和缓的运动可以使僵硬的肩部肌肉放松。

sentences.en: He was grateful for a chance to relax and collect his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他很庆幸有机会放松放松，整理一下自己的思绪。

sentences.en: I could not relax and still felt wide awake.
sentences.cn: 我无法放松，还是很清醒。

sentences.en: I just want to sit down and relax.
sentences.cn: 我只想坐下来休息一下。

sentences.en: If you feel a tenseness around the eyes, relax your muscles.
sentences.cn: 你要是觉得两眼周围紧绷，就放松一下肌肉。

sentences.en: Make a conscious effort to relax your muscles.
sentences.cn: 有意识地放松肌肉。

sentences.en: Massage is used to relax muscles, relieve stress and improve the circulation.
sentences.cn: 按摩可以使肌肉放松，缓解压力和促进血液循环。

sentences.en: Muscles stretch, slacken and relax during child-birth.
sentences.cn: 生孩子的时候，肌肉会拉抻、放松，然后松弛下来。

sentences.en: Relax and take a breather whenever you feel that you need one.
sentences.cn: 要放松，什么时候觉得需要休息就休息一下。

sentences.en: Relax as much as possible and keep breathing steadily.
sentences.cn: 尽量放松，保持平稳呼吸。

sentences.en: Relax, smile; loosen up in mind and body and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 放松，微笑。精神、身体和行为上都要放轻松。

sentences.en: Relax! You're getting too uptight about it.
sentences.cn: 轻松点儿！你对这事太紧张了。

sentences.en: The man and the woman mingled as everyone started to relax.
sentences.cn: 当大家开始放松的时候,这一男一女就开始交往了.

sentences.en: The massage relaxed my tense back muscles.
sentences.cn: 按摩使得我背部紧张的肌肉松弛下来。

sentences.en: We took time to relax in the cosily decorated drawing room.
sentences.cn: 我们在布置得温暖而又舒适的客厅里休息了一会儿。

sentences.en: What Robyn needed was a drink to relax her.
sentences.cn: 萝宾需要的是喝一杯放松放松。

sentences.en: When I get home from work I like to relax with the newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我下班回到家里，喜欢看看报纸，放松一下。

sentences.en: When I'm tired, I like to relax into a deep armchair.
sentences.cn: 我疲倦时, 喜欢舒舒服服地靠在一把高扶手椅子上休息一下.

words.tran_cn: 松懈的，放松的；悠闲的，自在的；不严格的，不拘束的
放松，休息；松懈，松弛；变从容；休养

phrases.tran_cn: 放松自己；放松某人自己

trans.tran_en: if you relax a part of your body or it relaxes, it becomes less stiff or less tight
